article.title: TCOM Aerostat Contract Modified
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: TCOM LLP, Columbia, Maryland, is being awarded a $13,445,124 contract modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price contract to exercise an option for the procurement of seven TCOM 22M aerostat systems, site and tether-up spares, and line replaceable units in support of Persistent Ground Surveillance Systems being fielded by the Army.Â The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
